quote_first: He reached blindly for his phone and flicked it open.
quote_last: . Shit. Already late for work and… then, he remembered.
title: Wimmera
author: Mark Brandi

quote_first: OLIVE: [At KATHERINE’S elbow—examining her watch on its stand] It’s
quote_last:
.
KATHERINE: Olive, Olive!
OLIVE: I just wanted to see the time.
title: The Mob
author: John Galsworthy
